description: Returns all of the runtime parameters offered by the underlying database software, or engine, for a specific database in Amazon Lightsail. In addition to the parameter names and values, this operation returns other information about each parameter. This information includes whether changes require a reboot, whether the parameter is modifiable, the allowed values, and the data types.

parameters.name: relationalDatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of your database for which to get parameters.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request. To get a page token, perform an initial GetRelationalDatabaseParameters request. If your results are paginated, the response will return a next page token that you can specify as the page token in a subsequent request.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: An object describing the result of your get relational database parameters request.

nested_items.name: allowedValues
nested_items.description: Specifies the valid range of values for the parameter.

nested_items.name: applyMethod
nested_items.description: Indicates when parameter updates are applied.

nested_items.name: dataType
nested_items.description: Specifies the valid data type for the parameter.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: Provides a description of the parameter.

nested_items.name: isModifiable
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the parameter can be modified.

nested_items.name: parameterName
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the parameter.

nested_items.name: parameterValue
nested_items.description: Specifies the value of the parameter.

nested_items.name: nextPageToken
nested_items.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request.
